body: Pretty Please is a great way to build connections between charities and sponsors. We help create close partnerships by enabling charities to offer incentives to the sponsors.

header: Do I have to pay a fee for the registration?
body: Pretty Please does not have any registration fees.

header: How do I know if the charities are legitimate organisations?
body: All donations must go to a registered UK charity, which is confirmed when the charity profile is completed.

header: How do I know if any offers have been made on my request?
body: When you sign in you will be able to see any sponsors that have applied to sponsor your funding request.

header: How do I know if my offer of sponsorship has been accepted?
body: After signing in you can see all of your accepted offers when you click on the Offers Accepted button.

header: How do I foster long lasting partnership with sponsors?
body: Pretty Please is the beginning of the relationship with your sponsors. The incentives allow for close partnerships over the duration of the sponsorship by enabling closer communications and shared experiences.
